offenceSummary.offenceTitle: Assault by beating of an emergency worker
offenceSummary.offenceLegislation: Contrary to section 39 of the Criminal Justice Act 1988 and section 1 of the Assaults on Emergency Workers (Offences) Act 2018.

offenceSummary.offenceTitle: Conspire to commit a burglary dwelling with intent to steal
offenceSummary.offenceLegislation: Contrary to section 1(1) of the Criminal Law Act 1977.
offenceSummary.wording:
Between 06.03.2021 and 22.03.2021 at DERBY in the county of DERBYSHIRE, conspired together with Harry Potter to enter as a trespasser, a number of dwellings within the CHADDESDEN and LITTLEOVER areas of DERBY, with intent to steal therein
'Contrary to section 1(1) of the Criminal Law Act 1977.'
 -- CCCJS CODE: 'TH68026C'
